attributes.action: Increase the Personal Allowance in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Increase the Personal Allowance to a higher figure than £5,225. With the recession in progress, people are struggling to pay their taxes as well as everything else. We believe that this amount should be increased because earning such a small amount and being taxed is causing bankruptcy etc.
